Title: Silverlight Preloader
Description: Display a custom preloader (progressbar) in Silverlight. This project explains how to turn your logo or graphic to a progress bar by filling it with color when Silverlight is loading.
HomeWiki:
Since most of custom progressbars are simple rectangular shape it will be a good idea to turn your own logo or graphic to a progressbar. This project changes the standard Silverlight preloader/progressbar into custom loader that fills Silverlight Tips logo with color while loading the app.

For live demo and step by step tutorial go to: http://www.silverlighttips.com/?tag=/preloader.
